HaYeon

Korean: 하연

17 years old

Height:

tripleS
Group (2023-2024):
NXT

Introduction

HaYeon is a South Korean singer and dancer under MODHAUS.

On December 23, 2023, HaYeon was introduced as the nineteenth member of the girl group tripleS under MODHAUS. She first released the single "Just Do It" as part of the sub-unit NXT, before officially debuting with tripleS on May 8, 2024, with the album "ASSEMBLE24".

As a member of tripleS, HaYeon was placed in the sub-unit NXT.
